attributes.description: The next generation Mahindra Pik Up Single Cab has been designed to be strong and practical, with all the power you need to get the job done. A large load box with a maximum payload of 1200 kg, and a braked towing capacity of 2500 kg make it the hard working, dependable team player you've always wanted. All this comes with a contemporary look that includes a restyled signature Mahindra Single Cab 4x4 front grille with chrome inserts, dual projector headlamps, an integrated air-scoop in the bonnet, and tough wrap-around bumpers.
